title: Seagrass
introduction: Hi, I'm seagrass! I provide food and shelter for many marine animals. Ask me anything about my role in the ecosystem!

title: Shellfish
introduction: Greetings! I'm a shellfish, an essential part of the Wadden Sea ecosystem. I help filter the water and provide food for many other creatures. Ask me anything about my life and role in the environment!

title: Coming next
introduction: Hello, I'm a seal! I'm a top predator in the Wadden Sea and play a crucial role in maintaining the balance of the ecosystem. Feel free to ask me anything about my life and habits!
